task_description: In app audio recorder, Configure the audio recorder settings to use M4A format, 8kHz sample rate, 128 kbps bitrate, and Stereo channel count, then apply these settings.
In app audio recorder, Change the sample rate to 44.1kHz, then apply the changes.

In app audio recorder, Configure the audio recorder to use the following settings: Theme Blue Gray, Naming Record-1.m4a, Recording format M4a, Sample rate 44.1kHz, Bitrate 128 kbps, and Channel count Stereo. Then apply these settings.
In app audio recorder, Configure the audio recorder settings to use M4A format, 22kHz sample rate, 128 kbps bitrate, and Stereo channel count, then apply these settings to start recording audio.
In app audio recorder, Task-Oriented: Configure the audio recorder settings to use a sample rate of 44.1kHz, a bitrate of 128 kbps, and stereo channel count, then apply these settings.

In app audio recorder, Task-Oriented: Configure the audio recorder settings by first viewing the information about sample rates, then closing the information window and applying the current settings to start recording with the default 'Record-1.m4a' naming.
In app audio recorder, Configure the audio recorder settings to use M4A format, a sample rate of 44.1kHz, a bitrate of 128 kbps, and stereo channel count, then apply these settings.

In app audio recorder, Configure the audio recorder to use the following settings: M4A format, 22kHz sample rate, 48 kbps bitrate, and Stereo channel count, then apply these settings to be ready for recording.
In app audio recorder, Configure the audio recorder to use the following settings: M4A format, 48kHz sample rate, 128 kbps bitrate, and Stereo channel count, then apply these settings.
In app audio recorder, Set the audio recording sample rate to 8kHz and apply the changes to the audio recorder settings.
